column5: Seems the Toronto Maple Leafs new skates are to have toe picks!!!!   LOL  Article
But they already float around the ice like a bunch of pansies. A figure skating coach is the last thing they need.
When I read Barb Underhill my first thought was... cool, they finally signed someone with proper levels of pugnacity, testosterone, truculence and belligerence. Only to be let down again.
Now... if it was CARRIE UNDERWOOD... then it's something to talk about! She can teach me how to skate ANY day of the week!
